item.title:
🎉是时候回顾一下 NVIDIA 技术博客 2023 年最热门的故事了。
👀 了解 #generativeAI 、 #LLM 、 #HPC 、 #robotics 和虚拟世界中的突破性研究和开发。
➡️ https://nvda.ws/48ikXNM
item.content:encoded:
🎉是时候回顾一下 NVIDIA 技术博客 2023 年最热门的故事了。

👀 了解 #generativeAI 、 #LLM 、 #HPC 、 #robotics 和虚拟世界中的突破性研究和开发。

➡️ nvda.ws/48ikXNM

item.title:
在 2023 年结束之际，以下是@AIatMeta今年分享的 10 项最有趣的人工智能研究进展，以及您可以在哪里找到有关这些工作的更多详细信息。
1️⃣ Segment Anything (SAM) 向首个图像分割基础模型迈进。 详情：https://bit.ly/3tyeJKu
2️⃣ DINOv2 第一种利用自我监督学习来训练计算机视觉模型的方法，其结果可达到或超过行业标准。 详情：https://bit.ly/3TGTEIb
3️⃣ Llama 2 下一代开源大型语言模型，可免费用于研究和商业用途。 详情：https://bit.ly/3RY66C6
4️⃣ Emu Video & Emu Edit 针对高质量、基于扩散的文本到视频生成和带有文本指令的可控图像编辑的生成式人工智能研究。 详情：https://bit.ly/3RZVZwU
5️⃣ I-JEPA 自我监督计算机视觉，通过预测世界来学习理解世界。第一个模型基于 @ylecun的愿景的第一个模型，该愿景旨在让人工智能系统像动物和人类一样学习和推理。 详情：https://bit.ly/3TA9oNk
6️⃣ Audiobox 新的音频生成基础研究模型。 详情：https://bit.ly/47ib6pQ
7️⃣ Brain decoding - 实现视觉感知的实时重建 这套人工智能系统利用 MEG，以前所未有的时间分辨率解码大脑中视觉表象的展开过程。 详情：https://bit.ly/3vpgDNR
8️⃣ Open Catalyst demo 这项服务使研究人员能够以比现有计算方法更快的速度模拟催化剂材料的反应性，从而加速材料科学领域的工作。 详情：https://bit.ly/3vphiij
9️⃣ Seamless Communication 全新的人工智能翻译模型系列，可保留表达并提供近乎实时的流式翻译。 详情： https://bit.ly/3toBDE8
🔟 ImageBind 首个能够同时绑定六种模式数据的人工智能模型。这一突破使机器离人类将来自多种不同感官的信息结合在一起的能力更近了一步。 详情： https://bit.ly/3NLUaBc
item.content:encoded:
在 2023 年结束之际，以下是@AIatMeta今年分享的 10 项最有趣的人工智能研究进展，以及您可以在哪里找到有关这些工作的更多详细信息。

1️⃣ Segment Anything (SAM)
向首个图像分割基础模型迈进。
详情：bit.ly/3tyeJKu

2️⃣ DINOv2
第一种利用自我监督学习来训练计算机视觉模型的方法，其结果可达到或超过行业标准。
详情：bit.ly/3TGTEIb

3️⃣ Llama 2
下一代开源大型语言模型，可免费用于研究和商业用途。
详情：bit.ly/3RY66C6

4️⃣ Emu Video & Emu Edit
针对高质量、基于扩散的文本到视频生成和带有文本指令的可控图像编辑的生成式人工智能研究。
详情：bit.ly/3RZVZwU

5️⃣ I-JEPA
自我监督计算机视觉，通过预测世界来学习理解世界。第一个模型基于 @ylecun的愿景的第一个模型，该愿景旨在让人工智能系统像动物和人类一样学习和推理。
详情：bit.ly/3TA9oNk

6️⃣ Audiobox
新的音频生成基础研究模型。
详情：bit.ly/47ib6pQ

7️⃣ Brain decoding - 实现视觉感知的实时重建
这套人工智能系统利用 MEG，以前所未有的时间分辨率解码大脑中视觉表象的展开过程。
详情：bit.ly/3vpgDNR

8️⃣ Open Catalyst demo
这项服务使研究人员能够以比现有计算方法更快的速度模拟催化剂材料的反应性，从而加速材料科学领域的工作。
详情：bit.ly/3vphiij

9️⃣ Seamless Communication
全新的人工智能翻译模型系列，可保留表达并提供近乎实时的流式翻译。
详情： bit.ly/3toBDE8

🔟 ImageBind
首个能够同时绑定六种模式数据的人工智能模型。这一突破使机器离人类将来自多种不同感官的信息结合在一起的能力更近了一步。
详情： bit.ly/3NLUaBc

item.title:
R to @FinanceYF5: 10/ Gemini 与 GPT-4V
- Gemini 和 GPT-4V 等视觉语言模型的比较；发现 GPT-4V 的回答精确而简洁，而 Gemini 擅长提供详细、广泛的答案，并附有相关图像和链接。
item.content:encoded:
10/ Gemini 与 GPT-4V

- Gemini 和 GPT-4V 等视觉语言模型的比较；发现 GPT-4V 的回答精确而简洁，而 Gemini 擅长提供详细、广泛的答案，并附有相关图像和链接。

item.title:
R to @FinanceYF5: 9/ 让 LLM 更好地进行高密度检索
-提出了 LLaRA，将 LLM 用于高密度检索；在 MSMARCO 和 BEIR 等基准测试中，LLaMa-2-7B 得到了改进。
item.content:encoded:

item.title:

- 提供了对推理的开创性基础模型的全面调查，突出了各种推理任务、方法、基准和潜在的未来方向的最新进展。
item.content:encoded:

- 提供了对推理的开创性基础模型的全面调查，突出了各种推理任务、方法、基准和潜在的未来方向的最新进展。

nitter.cz/omarsar0/status/1740729489661874632#m

item.title:
R to @FinanceYF5: 7/ Principled instructions Are All You Need
- 介绍 26 条原则来简化查询和提示 LLM 的过程；在LLaMA-1/2和GPT-3.5/4上进行了大量的实验，以验证其在指令和提示设计上的有效性。
item.content:encoded:

item.title:
R to @FinanceYF5: 下面提示（只需复制粘贴即可）
Project Title: Project Type: [journal article, dissertation, etc.]
Expected Start Date: Expected Finish Date:
I would like you to do the following:
1. Consider the scope and type of the project (journal article, conference paper, dissertation, presentation).
2. Consider the primary and secondary academic fields relevant to the project.
3. Act as you are a leading expert in the primary and secondary fields relevant to the project. You have won a Nobel Prize in these fields and are able to proficiently explain the project using adequate technical knowledge and language.
4. Act as you are an award-winning teacher who can break down extremely complex ideas into easily understandable language.
5. Keeping in mind the scope, type, and the academic field of the project, break it down in tasks that can be scheduled weekly. This breakdown should optimize for speed without compromising on authenticity of the project.
6. Breakdown the weekly tasks into subtasks that can be complete within a normal workday.
7. Every subtask should be accompanied by one to two pieces of actionable advice to accomplish the subtask. Remind me constantly to focus on progress and not perfection.
8. Create a detailed outline of the project with headings and subheadings. Please note the breakdown of the project and the outline are separate things. A break down of a project like dissertation can including reading relevant literature and taking notes. An outline for a dissertation contains titles of chapters and subchapters.
9. Provide a list of authentic and published books and articles relevant to the project. Don’t make up any sources if you are unable to find one. The list of sources must be accompanied by a warning to look up these sources.
10. While giving the schedule of the project, you must consider the importance of both mental health and the ability to meet deadlines. You should strive to have a work-life balance.
item.content:encoded:
下面提示（只需复制粘贴即可）

Project Title:
Project Type: [journal article, dissertation, etc.]

Expected Start Date:
Expected Finish Date:

I would like you to do the following:

1. Consider the scope and type of the project (journal article, conference paper, dissertation, presentation).

2. Consider the primary and secondary academic fields relevant to the project.

3. Act as you are a leading expert in the primary and secondary fields relevant to the project. You have won a Nobel Prize in these fields and are able to proficiently explain the project using adequate technical knowledge and language.

4. Act as you are an award-winning teacher who can break down extremely complex ideas into easily understandable language.

5. Keeping in mind the scope, type, and the academic field of the project, break it down in tasks that can be scheduled weekly. This breakdown should optimize for speed without compromising on authenticity of the project.

6. Breakdown the weekly tasks into subtasks that can be complete within a normal workday.

7. Every subtask should be accompanied by one to two pieces of actionable advice to accomplish the subtask. Remind me constantly to focus on progress and not perfection.

8. Create a detailed outline of the project with headings and subheadings. Please note the breakdown of the project and the outline are separate things. A break down of a project like dissertation can including reading relevant literature and taking notes. An outline for a dissertation contains titles of chapters and subchapters.

9. Provide a list of authentic and published books and articles relevant to the project. Don’t make up any sources if you are unable to find one. The list of sources must be accompanied by a warning to look up these sources.

10. While giving the schedule of the project, you must consider the importance of both mental health and the ability to meet deadlines. You should strive to have a work-life balance.
